metadata.min_stack_comments: New fields added to GitHub Integration

author: Elastic
rule.description: Detects a high number of unique private repo clone events originating from a single personal access token within a short time period.
rule.name: High Number of Cloned GitHub Repos From PAT
rule.query:
event.dataset:"github.audit" and event.category:"configuration" and event.action:"git.clone" and 
github.programmatic_access_type:("OAuth access token" or "Fine-grained personal access token") and 
github.repository_public:false
